name: Senkikumaru
description: A slightly chuuni young man who walks his path with determination.

passiveSkill.name: Meditation
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "A fierce tiger, Mad Cloud, is hidden in Senkikumaru's scroll. Summons Mad Cloud when Senkikumaru joins the battle. Mad Cloud has {placeholder} of Senkikumaru's ATK, {placeholder} of his DEF, {placeholder} of his HP, {placeholder} of his Rage and all of his buffs. Mad Cloud unleashes Tiger Roar when its Rage is full, dealing ATK*{placeholder} damage to all enemies. (Max 2 Mad Cloud on the field.)Lineup Skill:Activation Requirement: Leader is Sakura Swordsman or Axe of Dawn.Activation Effect: The damage of Mad Cloud's Tiger Roar becomes true damage."}

uniqueSkill.name: North to South
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Look at my stylish move! Senkikumaru throws a scroll. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK*{placeholder} damage. If Mad Cloud is present, restores {placeholder} of Max HP and {placeholder} Rage to Mad Cloud."}

specialSkill.name: Reveal
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Senkikumaru opens a scroll. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK*{placeholder} damage. If Mad Cloud is present, orders it to attack once.Skill Cast Rate:{placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Scroll Blow
normalSkill.description: Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Look at my stylish move! Senkikumaru throws a scroll. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK*{placeholder} damage. If Mad Cloud is present, restores {placeholder} of Max HP and {placeholder} Rage to Mad Cloud.
